channel.title: Business / Artificial Intelligence on Late News
channel.description: Recent content in Business / Artificial Intelligence on Late News

item.title: OpenAI Launches GPT-4.5 for ChatGPT—It’s Huge and Compute-Intensive
item.description: Internally called Orion, GPT-4.5 is OpenAI’s largest model to date, and it’s first available through the company’s $200 monthly ChatGPT subscription.

item.title: Boston Dynamics Led a Robot Revolution. Now Its Machines Are Teaching Themselves New Tricks
item.description: Boston Dynamics founder Marc Raibert says reinforcement learning is helping his creations gain more independence.

item.title: A Team of Female Founders Is Launching Cloud Security Tech That Could Overhaul AI Protection
item.description: Cloud “container” defenses have inconsistencies that can give attackers too much access. A new company, Edera, is taking on that challenge and the problem of the male-dominated startup world.
